main.hero_subtitle: Art studio in Barcelona where creativity flows freely. For families, couples, groups of friends and teams. No skills needed!
main.why_fun_description: Forget about paintbrushes. In our studio you'll try fun and unconventional techniques to create your abstract masterpiece, including:

pouring.title: Pouring
pouring.description: Pour different colors and watch them mix forming hypnotic patterns.

spinning.title: Spinning
spinning.description: Create radial designs by spinning your canvas after applying paint.

boxing.title: Boxing
boxing.description: Box your way to artistic expression with paint-covered boxing gloves.

balloons.title: Balloons
balloons.description: Create playful splash patterns by popping paint-filled balloons over the canvas.

balls.title: Balls
balls.description: Create vibrant splatters by throwing paint-dipped padel balls against the canvas.

guns.title: Water Guns
guns.description: Create color explosions by shooting paint with fun water guns on the canvas.

dripping.title: Dripping
dripping.description: Create unique strokes by letting paint drip freely on the canvas, pure Pollock style.

surprise.title: Surprise
surprise.description: Discover our secret technique: a surprise experience that transforms the canvas into pure fun and color.

techniques.more: And many more! Try any of these or invent your own!

main.step1_description: Choose the date and time that works best for you and your companions and get ready for an unforgettable creative adventure.
main.step2_title: Arrive and Get a Welcome Drink
main.step2_description: Enter our space, relax and get ready to have fun with art.
main.step3_description: Put on a protective suit, gloves and shoe covers so you can fully immerse yourself without worrying about the mess.
main.step4_description: Select your favorite paints and unleash your creativity. No rules, just play!

main.step6_description: Your painting will be ready to pick up in 24-48 hours once it dries.
